column4: hey guys i was just wondering if theres any way of faking a resalution, so everything is smaller
it's way less annoying if you tell us your goal
sorry i mean im on 1024x728 resalution, thats the highest i can goto and it's just looks all too big for me and i was wondering if you could fale a 1280x1024 resalution as my laptop dosnt allow it
faking resolutions has nothing to do with it?
